name: Adaptability
desc: Powers up moves of the same type.

name: Aerilate
desc: Turns Normal-type moves into Flying-type moves.

name: Aftermath
desc: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

name: Air Lock
desc: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Analytic
desc: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

name: Anger Point
desc: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

name: Anticipation
desc: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

name: Arena Trap
desc: Prevents the foe from fleeing.

name: Aroma Veil
desc: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

name: Aura Break
desc: Reduces power of Dark- and Fairy-type moves.

name: Bad Dreams
desc: Reduces a sleeping foe's HP.

name: Battery
desc: Raises power of teammates' Special moves.

name: Battle Armor
desc: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

name: Battle Bond
desc: Transform into Ash-Greninja after causing opponent to faint.

name: Beast Boost
desc: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

name: Berserk
desc: Raises Special Attack when HP drops below half.

name: Big Pecks
desc: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

name: Blaze
desc: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

name: Bulletproof
desc: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

name: Cheek Pouch
desc: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

name: Chlorophyll
desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

name: Clear Body
desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

name: Cloud Nine
desc: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Color Change
desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move.

name: Comatose
desc: The Pokémon is always asleep but can still attack.

name: Competitive
desc: Raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

name: Compound Eyes
desc: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

name: Contrary
desc: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

name: Corrosion
desc: The Pokémon can poison Steel and Poison types.

name: Cursed Body
desc: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

name: Cute Charm
desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

name: Damp
desc: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

name: Dancer
desc: Copies the foe's Dance moves.

name: Dark Aura
desc: Raises power of Dark type moves for all Pokémon in battle.

name: Dazzling
desc: Protects the Pokémon from high-priority moves.

name: Defeatist
desc: Lowers stats when HP drops below half.

name: Defiant
desc: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.

name: Delta Stream
desc: Creates strong winds when the ability activates.

name: Desolate Land
desc: Turns the sunlight extremely harsh when the ability activates.

name: Disguise
desc: Avoids damage for one turn.

name: Download
desc: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.

name: Drizzle
desc: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

name: Drought
desc: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Dry Skin
desc: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

name: Early Bird
desc: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

name: Effect Spore
desc: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

name: Electric Surge
desc: The Pokémon creates an Electric Terrain when it enters a battle.

name: Emergency Exit
desc: Switches out when HP falls below 50%.

name: Fairy Aura
desc: Raises power of Fairy type moves for all Pokémon in battle.

name: Filter
desc: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.

name: Flame Body
desc: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

name: Flare Boost
desc: Powers up special attacks when burned.

name: Flash Fire
desc: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

name: Flower Gift
desc: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

name: Flower Veil
desc: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

name: Fluffy
desc: Halves damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.

name: Forecast
desc: Castform transforms with the weather.

name: Forewarn
desc: Determines what moves a foe has.

name: Friend Guard
desc: Reduces damage done to allies.

name: Frisk
desc: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

name: Full Metal Body
desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

name: Fur Coat
desc: Reduces damage from physical moves.

name: Gale Wings
desc: Gives priority to Flying-type moves.

name: Galvanize
desc: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves and their power boosted.

name: Gluttony
desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

name: Gooey
desc: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

name: Grass Pelt
desc: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

name: Grassy Surge
desc: The Pokémon creates a Grassy Terrain when it enters a battle.

name: Guts
desc: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

name: Harvest
desc: May create another Berry after one is used.

name: Healer
desc: May heal an ally's status conditions.

name: Heatproof
desc: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

name: Heavy Metal
desc: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

name: Honey Gather
desc: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

name: Huge Power
desc: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

name: Hustle
desc: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

name: Hydration
desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

name: Hyper Cutter
desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

name: Ice Body
desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

name: Illuminate
desc: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

name: Illusion
desc: Enters battle disguised as the last Pokémon in the party.

name: Immunity
desc: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

name: Imposter
desc: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

name: Infiltrator
desc: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

name: Innards Out
desc: Deals damage upon fainting.

name: Inner Focus
desc: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

name: Insomnia
desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

name: Intimidate
desc: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

name: Iron Barbs
desc: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

name: Iron Fist
desc: Boosts the power of punching moves.

name: Justified
desc: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

name: Keen Eye
desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

name: Klutz
desc: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

name: Leaf Guard
desc: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

name: Levitate
desc: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

name: Light Metal
desc: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

name: Lightning Rod
desc: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

name: Limber
desc: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

name: Liquid Ooze
desc: Damages attackers using any draining move.

name: Liquid Voice
desc: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

name: Long Reach
desc: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

name: Magic Bounce
desc: Reflects status- changing moves.

name: Magic Guard
desc: Protects the Pokémon from indirect damage.

name: Magician
desc: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

name: Magma Armor
desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

name: Magnet Pull
desc: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.

name: Marvel Scale
desc: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.

name: Mega Launcher
desc: Boosts the power of aura and pulse moves.

name: Merciless
desc: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

name: Minus
desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

name: Misty Surge
desc: The Pokémon creates a Misty Terrain when it enters a battle.

name: Mold Breaker
desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

name: Moody
desc: Raises one stat and lowers another.

name: Motor Drive
desc: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

name: Moxie
desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

name: Multiscale
desc: Reduces damage when HP is full.

name: Multitype
desc: Changes type to match the held Plate.

name: Mummy
desc: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

name: Natural Cure
desc: All status problems heal when it switches out.

name: Neuroforce
desc: Powers up moves that are super effective.

name: No Guard
desc: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

name: Normalize
desc: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.

name: Oblivious
desc: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

name: Overcoat
desc: Protects the Pokémon from weather damage.

name: Overgrow
desc: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

name: Own Tempo
desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

name: Parental Bond
desc: Allows the Pokémon to attack twice.

name: Pickpocket
desc: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

name: Pickup
desc: The Pokémon may pick up items.

name: Pixilate
desc: Turns Normal-type moves into Fairy-type moves.

name: Plus
desc: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

name: Poison Heal
desc: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

name: Poison Point
desc: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

name: Poison Touch
desc: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

name: Power Construct
desc: Changes form when HP drops below half.

name: Power of Alchemy
desc: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Prankster
desc: Gives priority to a status move.

name: Pressure
desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

name: Primordial Sea
desc: Makes it rain heavily when the ability activates.

name: Prism Armor
desc: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.

name: Protean
desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

name: Psychic Surge
desc: The Pokémon creates a Psychic Terrain when it enters a battle.

name: Pure Power
desc: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

name: Queenly Majesty
desc: Prevents use of priority moves.

name: Quick Feet
desc: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

name: Rain Dish
desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

name: Rattled
desc: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

name: Receiver
desc: Inherits an ally's ability when it faints.

name: Reckless
desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

name: Refrigerate
desc: Turns Normal-type moves into Ice-type moves.

name: Regenerator
desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

name: Rivalry
desc: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

name: RKS System
desc: Changes type depending on held item.

name: Rock Head
desc: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

name: Rough Skin
desc: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.

name: Run Away
desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

name: Sand Force
desc: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

name: Sand Rush
desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

name: Sand Stream
desc: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

name: Sand Veil
desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

name: Sap Sipper
desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

name: Schooling
desc: Changes Wishiwashi to School Form.

name: Scrappy
desc: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

name: Serene Grace
desc: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

name: Shadow Shield
desc: Reduces damage when HP is full.

name: Shadow Tag
desc: Prevents the foe from escaping.

name: Shed Skin
desc: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

name: Sheer Force
desc: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

name: Shell Armor
desc: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

name: Shield Dust
desc: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

name: Shields Down
desc: Changes stats when HP drops below half.

name: Simple
desc: Doubles all stat changes.

name: Skill Link
desc: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

name: Slow Start
desc: Temporarily halves Attack and Speed.

name: Slush Rush
desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

name: Sniper
desc: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

name: Snow Cloak
desc: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

name: Snow Warning
desc: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

name: Solar Power
desc: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

name: Solid Rock
desc: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.

name: Soul-Heart
desc: Raises Special Attack when an ally faints.

name: Soundproof
desc: Gives immunity to sound-based moves.

name: Speed Boost
desc: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

name: Stakeout
desc: Deals double damage to Pokémon switching in.

name: Stall
desc: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

name: Stamina
desc: Raises Defense when attacked.

name: Stance Change
desc: Changes form depending on moves used.

name: Static
desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

name: Steadfast
desc: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

name: Steelworker
desc: Powers up Steel-type moves.

name: Stench
desc: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

name: Sticky Hold
desc: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

name: Storm Drain
desc: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

name: Strong Jaw
desc: Boosts the power of biting moves.

name: Sturdy
desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

name: Suction Cups
desc: Negates all moves that force switching out.

name: Super Luck
desc: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

name: Surge Surfer
desc: Doubles Speed during Electric Terrain.

name: Swarm
desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

name: Sweet Veil
desc: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

name: Swift Swim
desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

name: Symbiosis
desc: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

name: Synchronize
desc: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

name: Tangled Feet
desc: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

name: Tangling Hair
desc: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

name: Technician
desc: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

name: Telepathy
desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

name: Teravolt
desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

name: Thick Fat
desc: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

name: Tinted Lens
desc: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

name: Torrent
desc: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

name: Tough Claws
desc: Boosts the power of contact moves.

name: Toxic Boost
desc: Powers up physical attacks when poisoned.

name: Trace
desc: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

name: Triage
desc: Gives priority to restorative moves.

name: Truant
desc: Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

name: Turboblaze
desc: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

name: Unaware
desc: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

name: Unburden
desc: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

name: Unnerve
desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

name: Victory Star
desc: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

name: Vital Spirit
desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

name: Volt Absorb
desc: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

name: Water Absorb
desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

name: Water Bubble
desc: Halves damage from Fire-type moves, doubles power of Water-type moves used, and prevents burns.

name: Water Compaction
desc: Sharply raises Defense when hit by a Water-type move.

name: Water Veil
desc: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

name: Weak Armor
desc: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

name: White Smoke
desc: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

name: Wimp Out
desc: Switches out when HP drops below half.

name: Wonder Guard
desc: Only supereffective moves will hit.

name: Wonder Skin
desc: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

name: Zen Mode
desc: Changes form when HP drops below half.
